about.title: About Medicare
about.subtitle: Medicare is a reliable distribution company operating in the field of medical supplies in Uzbekistan.
about.mission: Since 2018, Medicare has been supplying medical institutions, clinics, laboratories, and private medical centers with high-quality medical products. We operate based on the principles of quality, responsibility, honesty, and trust. We aim to build long-term and sustainable partnerships with every client.
about.qualityDesc: All our products meet CE and ISO certification standards, ensuring safety and reliability.
about.logisticsDesc: Modern warehouse facilities and efficient delivery network across Uzbekistan.
about.certificationDesc: CE certified and ISO compliant products with full documentation.
whyChooseList: Wide and constantly updated product range

timeline.founded: Company founded with a vision for quality healthcare distribution

about.teamDesc: Over 150 dedicated professionals ensuring your medical supplies arrive on time, every time.
about.ctaDesc: MEDICARE is open to cooperation with public and private clinics, diagnostic centers, laboratories, and healthcare professionals.
about.ceoDesc: Visionary leader with over 15 years of experience shaping the future of our company.
about.ctoDesc: Tech mastermind leading cutting-edge development and innovation in our products.
about.cmoDesc: Creative strategist scaling our brand globally with bold marketing vision.

account.name: Name

contacts.text: Our team is always ready to help. Contact our specialists in the way that’s most convenient for you — we’ll suggest the best solutions for your clinic.
contacts.title: Contact Us
contacts.subtitle: Get in touch with our team

faq.a1: Standard delivery: 1–3 business days. Express: same-day in Tashkent.
faq.a2: Yes, we ship to CIS countries and select international destinations.
faq.q3: How can I track my order?
faq.a3: You’ll receive a tracking link via SMS and email after dispatch.
faq.a4: 30-day returns on unopened products. Contact support to initiate.

footer.description: Professional medical supplies wholesaler in Uzbekistan

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Medicare collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
privacy.collectionText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you request a price list or contact us.
privacy.usageText: We use the information to respond to your inquiries, provide services, and improve our offerings.
privacy.protectionText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Medicare's services, you agree to these terms.
terms.servicesText: Medicare provides wholesale medical supplies to healthcare facilities and institutions.
terms.ordersText: All orders are subject to availability and confirmation. Delivery times are estimates.
terms.liabilityText: Medicare strives to provide accurate product information but does not guarantee absolute accuracy.

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.success_message: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
reset_password.invalid_link_message: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
reset_password.success_message: Your password has been reset successfully. Redirecting to your account...
